---
title: Example Letter
format:
  cornell-letterhead-typst:
    keep-typ: true

# Letter metadata used by the typst template:
letter-name: "Benjamin Soltoff"
letter-title: "Senior Researcher"
letter-roomnumber: "TBD Gates Hall"
letter-phonenumber: "+1 (607) 555-1234"
letter-faxnumber: "+1 (607) 255-9143"
letter-email: "ben@example.edu"
letter-website: "https://example.edu"
# point to a local logo file present in the repo (adjust path as needed)
letter-logo: "latex-letterhead/Bowers.png"
---

## Introduction

This document demonstrates the Cornell letterhead Typst format. Replace the letter-* fields in the YAML with your own values and render with Quarto to Typst.

## More Information

You can learn more about creating custom Typst templates here: 

<https://quarto.org/docs/prerelease/1.4/typst.html#custom-formats>
